title: Prison inmate targeted in shooting at Nagoda Teaching Hospital
byline: Nagoda Teaching Hospital came under a shocking security breach yesterday when a prison inmate receiving treatment in Ward No. 14 became the target of a gunman, police confirmed.

title: Plastic bag use drops by 50% after free distribution ban
byline: The use of plastic shopping bags has dropped by 50 percent after the government banned their free distribution, Environment Deputy Minister Anton Jayakodi said.

title: 16-year-old girl Injured in Kohuwala shooting
byline: A 16-year-old girl was injured in a shooting incident reported last night from the Bodhiwatte area along Saranankara Road in Kohuwala, police said.
